mapper.sql: select id, name, tenant_id , franchisee_id from t_store
mapper.select: SELECT 1 FROM t_store WHERE del_flag=0 and franchisee_id = #{franchiseeId} AND tenant_id = #{tenantId} LIMIT 1

select count( case when #{tenantId} is null then case s.id when s.id then case s.del_flag when 0 then s.id end end else case tenant_id when #{tenantId} then case s.id when s.id then case s.del_flag when 0 then s.id end end end end ) as storeCount, p.id as pid, p.name from t_province p left join t_city c on p.id = c.pid left join t_store s on s.cid=c.id
p.id = p.id or s.id is null
GROUP BY p.id
